choose.when: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'

mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT noti_num, title, content, viewCount, regdate, noti_writer, update_regdate, update_id, delete_yn_code FROM NOTICE
WHERE delete_yn_code = 'N' ORDER BY noti_num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT noti_num, title, content, viewCount, regdate, noti_writer, update_regdate, update_id, delete_yn_code, LAG(noti_num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY noti_num DESC) nextNum, LEAD(noti_num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY noti_num DESC) prevNum FROM NOTICE
) result1 WHERE noti_num=#{noti_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (noti_num, title, content, viewCount, regdate, noti_writer, delete_yn_code) VALUES(NOTICE_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title},#{content}, 0, SYSDATE, #{noti_writer}, 'N')
